txt.en: 'You have saved our kingdom and our winter revels!'
'We are the Frostbluff Kings!'
'Woohoo!'
Yule: The Battle at Frostbluff
'I knew you could do it!'
'What a lovely cold!'
'What have you done?!'
'My cold will haunt you forever!'
<rgb=#FF0000>The mountain cold has launched a counter attack against you!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Something is coming...</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The punishing cold continues to attack the fort!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>The frigid cold shows no signs of faltering!</rgb>
<rgb=#FF0000>Cold has seeped into the fort, and the fire has gone out!</rgb>
'Bok, bok, bok....'
'Bok.'
'Bok!'
'Yes, the situation is dire, my queen.'
<rgb=#00FFFF>Encounter Complete: Winterhome remains safe!</rgb>
'My queen thanks you for saving Cluckland.'
'You are welcome to stay as long as you would like.'
<rgb=#00FF00>With the cold in retreat, now is your chance to reclaim the fort for the children of Winterhome!</rgb>
Quickly, go and reclaim Grumpwood Tower!
The Yule Festival must be underway in order to play this Festivity.
<rgb=#00FF00>The fort has been reclaimed!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFFF>Encounter: A frosty beast has come down from the mountains, threatening Winterhome!</rgb>
Oh, those are not just snowmen!
<rgb=#00FF00>With the Tower of Grumpwood secure, the Keep of Cluckland has need of your aid!</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>With the Keep of Cluckland secure, the Fortress of Frostlake has need of your aid!</rgb>
A cold wind blows through Cluckland.
Frigid air flows across the frozen floor of Frostlake Fortress.
<rgb=#00FF00>With Frostlake Fortress secure and the cold vanquished, the children of Winterhome rejoice!</rgb>
'I am the Frostbluff King!'
'No, I am the Frostbluff King!'
